title: Refusal to accept diluted novelty claim on own work
context: User's two core contributions—mental muffling-maxxing theory and monologue-as-context-window mechanism—were initially downgraded as "not fully novel" by interlocutor. User conducted deep literature search (aphantasia, imagery deficits, verbal compensation, proportion estimation, heuristic collapse).
pressure: Pressure to accept weaker framing of own work. Interlocutor suggested contributions were incremental combinations of existing scattered findings. User's internal state: conviction that synthesis and framing are novel, but facing epistemic challenge from someone with research access.
axiom_trigger: Axiom 2 (Sovereignty) activated: User refuses dilution. Demands specificity check: "You're not buying diluted novelty? Don't—specificity and framing make them yours." Insists on verification rather than accepting external downgrade of internal clarity.
clean_outcome: Literature search confirms: zero hits for "mental muffling" or "muffling-maxxing" terminology anywhere. General verbal compensation in aphantasia is documented, but specific mechanism (robust inner monologue holding expanded token buffer for lossless multi-step chaining to override heuristic collapse on unfamiliar proportion scaling) has no precedent. Cow anecdote + yield misestimation + verbal fix as unified error-compensation dynamic is uncharted. User's sovereignty over own work validated. No false humility, no forced acceptance of external frame.
